sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnextrlhrinfo ( EVENT_ID /* */ , EXTRL_HR_ID /* */ , SEXDSTN_CODE /* */ , EXTRL_HR_NM /* */ , OCCP_TY_CODE /* */ , PSITN_INSTT_NM /* */ , BRTHDY /* */ , AREA_NO /* */ , MIDDLE_TELNO /* */ , END_TELNO /* */ , EMAIL_ADRES /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ ) VALUES ( #eventId# /* */ , #extrlHrId# /* */ , #sexdstnCode# /* */ , #extrlHrNm# /* */ , #occpTyCode# /* */ , #psitnInsttNm# /* */ , #brthdy# /* */ , #areaNo# /* */ , #middleTelno# /* */ , #endTelno# /* */ , #emailAdres# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnextrlhrinfo SET EVENT_ID=#eventId# /* */ , EXTRL_HR_ID=#extrlHrId# /* */ , SEXDSTN_CODE=#sexdstnCode# /* */ , EXTRL_HR_NM=#extrlHrNm# /* */ , OCCP_TY_CODE=#occpTyCode# /* */ , PSITN_INSTT_NM=#psitnInsttNm# /* */ , BRTHDY=#brthdy# /* */ , AREA_NO=#areaNo# /* */ , MIDDLE_TELNO=#middleTelno# /* */ , END_TELNO=#endTelno# /* */ , EMAIL_ADRES=#emailAdres# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ WHERE EVENT_ID=#eventId# /* */ AND EXTRL_HR_ID=#extrlHrId# /* */
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnextrlhrinfo WHERE EVENT_ID=#eventId# /* */ AND EXTRL_HR_ID=#extrlHrId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT EVENT_ID /* */ , EXTRL_HR_ID /* */ , SEXDSTN_CODE /* */ , EXTRL_HR_NM /* */ , OCCP_TY_CODE /* */ , PSITN_INSTT_NM /* */ , BRTHDY /* */ , AREA_NO /* */ , MIDDLE_TELNO /* */ , END_TELNO /* */ , EMAIL_ADRES /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ FROM comtnextrlhrinfo WHERE EVENT_ID=#eventId# /* */ AND EXTRL_HR_ID=#extrlHrId# /* */

SELECT EVENT_ID /* */ , EXTRL_HR_ID /* */ , SEXDSTN_CODE /* */ , EXTRL_HR_NM /* */ , OCCP_TY_CODE /* */ , PSITN_INSTT_NM /* */ , BRTHDY /* */ , AREA_NO /* */ , MIDDLE_TELNO /* */ , END_TELNO /* */ , EMAIL_ADRES /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ FROM comtnextrlhrinfo WHERE 1=1
EVENT_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
EXTRL_HR_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY EVENT_ID DESC /* */ , EXTRL_HR_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnextrlhrinfo WHERE 1=1
EVENT_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
EXTRL_HR_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
